member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_D3D12_OPTIONS11
member.summary: Indicates whether or not 64-bit integer atomics on resources in descriptor heaps are supported.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_D3D12_OPTIONS11.AtomicInt64OnDescriptorHeapResourceSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether or not 64-bit integer atomics on resources in descriptor heaps are supported. true if supported, otherwise false.
